data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

A human shaman from the Obsidian Crag, cloaked in dark, volcanic-themed tribal garb, stands on a jagged cliff overlooking a corrupted, mana-drained volcanic island-world adrift in a sickly purple cosmic nebula. Their intricate black tattoos glow ominously, veins of dark light visibly spreading across their skin as they extend a hand, siphoning dark mana that coalesces from the blighted landscape into a swirling orb, showing the painful, self-sacrificial cost of their power.

Artist Credit: inspired by Karl Kopinski

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
